name: Block Puzzle -Glow Puzzle Game
description:
Block Puzzle! Glow Puzzle Game

It’s fun, Let’s play this Glow puzzle block which is incredibly intuitive and simple for all ages and skill levels.

The and horizontally. the more glow blocks eliminated you can, the more scores you will get. The ranking will be reset each week, You can challenge players all over the word.
From now on, Let's enjoy a simple and addictive glow coloring puzzle game! once you start, you'll be hooked. you can play games for free!

Glow Puzzle Game Features:
.Glow coloring themed puzzle
.Simple but fun game
.intuitive one-touch controls
.Elegantly design
.Weekly ranking

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the block will be clear and you get the point. Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
• Blocks can't be rotated.

You can play anytime and anywhere! We really hope you enjoy it!
Quickly, let's try the game.

PLEASE NOTE
Network connection is required.
